author: mattmann
msg: 1.3.0 release of the CAS Metadata Container: numerous improvements, and
new features including ability to specify preconditions for met extractors,
core met extractors including MetReaderExtractor and ExternMetExtractor,
and much more. See CHANGES.txt for a full list of updates. Thanks to all
who contributed to this release (in no particular order): bfoster, mattmann.

author: mattmann
msg: - fix for OODT-178: thanks to bfoster for testing in his env and helping to come up with the updated sol. Patch includes unit test
